website_summaries.verdict: Fans of the savage aquatic Mosasaurus will get their money’s worth out of this gigantic, durable, and expertly modeled toy.

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is gigantic, well detailed, and absolutely stunning! It is the ultimate collector’s piece for fans, and the ultimate toy for kids. All four flippers are articulated, as are the massive jaws! It’s also bathtub safe, so there’s no danger in letting your child take his/her new toy into the tub or pool.
customer_reviews.author: PaleoCollector

customer_reviews.title: This Mosasaurus is 28 INCHES in length!
customer_reviews.text: This Mosasaurus is huge. It is 28 inches long, and its jaw can open really wide. Unlike the Super Colossal Tyrannosaurus rex from this toy line, it can't swallow figures or mini dinosaurs. But you can hold 1 figure in the jaws, and close them, since there is room. It is hollow in the stomach region, and is quite soft and rubbery. It doesn't need batteries, and it is waterproof. You can play with this figure in the swimming pool, and reenact scenes from Jurassic World. Overall, this Mosasaurus toy is incredibly detailed, and I would recommend this to any fan of prehistoric marine reptiles or Jurassic World fans, or even dinosaur fans.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth N.

customer_reviews.title: 4 yo loves  it!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be more happy about this toy. Got it for my son on 4th birthday. By far his fav gift. Made well. Can get wet. I was very happy that it shipped out right away and unexpectedly came BEFORE his birthday, which was a huge win! Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: AqUdy1

customer_reviews.title: Tail Attachment Poorly Designed - Does not stay on
customer_reviews.text: The tail on the Mosasaurus is attached using a tab and a socket. The tolerances are not very good, especially since the toy is not exactly solid and made of a flexible plastic. The tail is also extremely heavy, which puts a lot of stress on the connection. We could never get the tail on our first Mosasaurus to stay attached. It kept falling off. Upon inspection, the female part of the ball and socket appeared to be deformed and does not properly latch. We returned it to Amazon for a replacement. The second Mosasaurus suffered from the same issues. I opted to just epoxy the tail to the main body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Junkie

customer_reviews.title: A Great Toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy!! I bought it for my son because he loves Jurassic Park, and he can't seem to want to put it down!! The material is very sturdy, the toy itself isn't overly heavy, and is made very well! It was a great investment, and I definitely got my money's worth buying it. You won't regret buying this for a child you love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Ball-Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Impressive size replica
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. a BIG Mosasaurus replica. Love it. Look forward to having it in my office :) If you are looking for one of these after being inspired by "Jurassic World", this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T

customer_reviews.title: awesome looking toy
customer_reviews.text: This reminds me of the 1993 Kenner Red Rex, soft and squishy to the touch compared to the solid plastic models hasbro was putting out for so long. Highly collectible and very detailed, awesome looking toy.
customer_reviews.author: Banana Gibson

customer_reviews.title: A good Dino!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it! He told he the mosasaurus is his favorite dinosaur and talked about how the mosasaurus eats other dinos (I think it’s in the movie) so I wanted to get him a big one that he can feed his other dinosaurs to! Didn’t disappoint and my reign as the coolest aunt continues
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Huge and awesome, every Dino fan should have this in there collection!
customer_reviews.text: Huge and awesome. My 7 yr old was super excited with this. Great quality. Textured feel and it’s huge. Super cool toy for any Dino fan. Buy it, they will absolutely love it! Mouth opens wide and very realistic look. Easy to assemble fins and tail. 7 yr old put together in a few minutes. Stays put together without falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: It was my 3 year old’s first Jurassic World dinosaur of his choice. It is so well-made. We didn’t know about the scan until he told us about it. What a cool dinosaur! The tail broke off but we super glued it back on with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kepaco

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for my son and immediately bought another one for my nephew. It’s HUGE! It’s the size of a 3-year/old’s entire body. They immediately hugged mosasaurus and called it their “pet.” The detailing is high quality. The only caveat is that there is some off-gassing, so you’ll want to air it out for a week or so before wrapping. Also, there is some assembly required — you’ll have to pop the fins in. This toy is a must if your kid loves “Jurassic World.” I also recommend the remote-control gyrosphere.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product / kinda pricey
customer_reviews.text: The toy was great for my 3 year old grandson he loved it , but let's be realistic 30.00 dollars is a little high especially when they probably only have 3-5 dollars in the thing . They charge these prices and get away with it because the prey on people's emotions and need to make others happy such as my grandson , the product as a whole is decent but we're emptying our pocket books to get them
customer_reviews.author: billy smith

customer_reviews.title: A pretty neat toy
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my nephew's birthday, and boy did it make him happy! It required a bit of assembly out of the box, which we managed to do just fine in our restaurant at Downtown Disney where we had met for his birthday lunch, so it wasn't too tough. It is a pretty big toy, but fine for him to handle as he was turning 6. My 3-year-old managed to hold and play with it as well, but ultimately probably would have been a little too big for him, especially to carry around for longer periods of time. Very real feel and nicely made! A big hit for this dinosaur-lover.
customer_reviews.author: Meggowatt

customer_reviews.title: but assembly was easy and he love it
customer_reviews.text: My son has wanted this since he first saw it in stores - it's quite large and needs to be put together (the tail and flippers), but assembly was easy and he love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B

customer_reviews.title: Huge! An awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: So the price was a little steep but this toy is great. It feels cool and it’s HUGE! Doesn’t stop my 4 year old from carting it everywhere though. He only wishes it came with a shark to eat like in the movie... lol! Very realistic and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Ru

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, big and realistic
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons 5th birthday, he absolutely loved Dinosaurs, and he thought it was awesome! It is huge! It looks real and he can take it in the bath! It was easy to assemble and it has the scanner like the other Jurassic world Dino’s so he can scan it on his app and learn facts about it. I would definitely say it was worth the money, especially for those Dino fanatics out there!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loved it for his birthday. He asked for a mosasaur and I was afraid I wouldnt be able to find him something worthwhile (last year he asked for a brachiosaurus and the one we ordered was small unfortunately). When it arrived, the box looked so small I was apprehensive but once its put together, its monstrous! My whole family was impressed. Definitely worth the money! Not expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Sharaa

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT packaging. Arrived earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT packaging. Arrived earlier than expected. BIGGER than I thought and I wear a 14 size shoe. This thing is bigger than both shoes line up back to back. Mouth opens and closes, fins are moveable. LOVE my Mosasaurus!
customer_reviews.author: ken sapp jr

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son due to the many reviews of the durability of this product. Well, when my son opened it up the tail was split completely in half and the other part is coming off, indicating the poor quality of the adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing that has arrived at our doorstep during quarantine. My 5 yr old went crazy. He takes this thing every where in the house and even to run pick up order errands. It’s huge and you must watch a YouTube video to understand how to put it together but we got it finally. If you child is into dinosaurs this is definitely the toy for them
customer_reviews.author: CustomerT

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old great nephew LOVED this. He had asked for it and was very excited to receive it. It is pretty impressive for sure. He uses two hands to hold it. It has a “real” feel and looks like it will last for years. It was expensive I think but worth it when I saw his happiness. Arrived on time and in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: My son is going to be so pumped. I had Jurassic Park 1,2 and 3 toys growing up. My mom kept them and my son plays with them all day every day. I'm buying a bunch of these toys for his own collection. This toy is huge and feel likes a real lizard. If you're thinking of buying this, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wroblewski

customer_reviews.title: Predator X!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! The size of this Predator X! My two young boys who are about to be 4 and 8 both wanted one and I got them for their birthday! They’re gonna freak and it feels so weird, lol. Gonna be nice as they can play with it in the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Harrell

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son for his 5th birthday and it was his favorite present! He loves to use it in the bathtub and it drains the water really well. Have to clip the fins and tail to the body to assemble but very easy to do. It has give to it so I don't have to worry about him hitting someone with it on accident and causing injury.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The YouTube reviews don't lie
customer_reviews.text: I did not believe the reviews that I watched one this item; I thought that it was smaller, at least by a little bit. The cameras however, were not playing tricks on my vision, this thing is huge. I am also blown away by how detailed and, in my opinion, realistic this is. The scaling is amazing and the inside of the mouth has the extra teeth. The tail is a bit small, but it is big enough. I just need to find a place to display it....
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Bohlin

customer_reviews.title: Jurassic Park Mosasaurus
customer_reviews.text: One of my son's favorite movies is Jurassic park so we had to get him the TREX! One day he was watching a video online and I noticed that he was very excited about eh Mosasaurus. We bought it for him and just as his TREX, the quality of the toy is over the top. Extremely durable and giftable for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: In our house, we cheer for the mosasaurus
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to put together, but once we did my son couldn’t get enough. He’s a big mosasaurus fan, and this is one big mosasaurus. It has creepy, realistic feeling skin and it is LONG when put together. He loves it!! Definitely one of the best quality Jurassic Park/Jurassic World toys we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Meredith

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TOY!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old wanted this for his 5th birthday and it did not disappointed! We had a very happy birthday boy when he opened this gift. This Mosasaurus was HUGE! Endless hours of imaginary play. The quality is great and it's very sturdy.The mouth opens and closes well - it's a great size to pretend to eat other dinosaurs or toys. Even though it's a larger toy it's lighter in weight making it easy for even my 2 year old to enjoy. My older four boys are 6,5,3,2 and they've all enjoyed this toy! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea Gray

customer_reviews.title: Tail doesn't stay on
customer_reviews.text: The tail did not attach properly (one of the tabs was broken from the start) and fell off every time my child played with it. Some super glue solved the problem, but it really shouldn't have been a problem in the first place. Once I solved the problem that shouldn't have existed, this toy has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome! After giving this to my son I’m the BEST mom ever! My 4yo LOVES this! He’s Dino obsessed and now I’m the queen of gifts. You have to put the flipper things on but it was easy. Definitely a must have for Dino kids! He takes it to the bath and the pool lol
customer_reviews.author: Alix Damron

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit with my Paleontologist in Training!
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled. It was “colossal” at 28” mouth to tail. Don’t overlook the directions tucked behind the flipper pieces. There is a little trick to get the flippers attached right, but it is great. “Real feel” claims delivered or at least what we think it would have felt like.
customer_reviews.author: Contact Kim

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. My son loves Jurassic world so we couldn't resist buying this. It's gigantic. Just a warning. My son keeps it in the bath because the water never drains out of it fully. So if you are going to play with it in the water, beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, so happy we got one
customer_reviews.text: my son had been asking and asking for the Jurassic World Mosasaur each time we went to the stores. I kept saying no and now that his bday is coming up i've been looking around for it. sold out everywhere!!! Thank goodness for amazon!! This toy is well worth it. Very big and has good detail. We plan on sticking a toy shark in it's mouth before we give it to him.
customer_reviews.author: jeannetteb

customer_reviews.title: awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: i'm a dad, and i don't usually have time to leave reviews, but this is literally the most awesome thing i've bought for my 3yo boy. he loves dinosaurs, and it's the biggest and baddest one that he has. it's huge, realistic, durable. my wife was initially skeptical and was scared of it (ha!) but is now completely on board, knowing how much he loves and plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty and Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy if your child is interested in dinosaurs. It is large so make sure to check the size. My son wanted a mosasaurus for a long time and this is a great toy for the price. Well made and has a wow factor. He is so excited to take it to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Aziza

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. Can’t put it together.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and in trying to put it together, the right fin would not click! It has a couple of scratches like it’s been used and the tail doesn’t line up with the body. Seems poorly made. I feel bad returning it since my kids were so excited to get this. Doesn’t feel like it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Quality of material.
customer_reviews.text: Really large, and very well made. Positive assembly of legs onto body of dinosaur. Should stay together really well. Soft meterial so not apt to break like other dinosaur toys offered by other companies. Overall a super product. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: James Morton

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old loves it !
customer_reviews.text: My son is just getting into dinosaurs and Jurassic Park. He loves this one, it’s amazing but don’t submerge it in water- this is not a bath toy. Which is ironic because this is an aquatic animal LOL. Either way he loves it, he pretends it’s his pet. It’s pretty big!
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Very large.
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed the Jurassic world T-rex prior to this, but I'll give it the same review. This is great for children who love dinosaurs and Jurassic Park. My 5 year old was ecstatic when he received this. He had to show everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Fun toy. Amazon Carriers suck
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine. No issues. Fast delivery was great. However, Amazon Carriers don’t read delivery instructions. Too big of a hurry. They either can’t read or don’t care. Leaving packages on open steps in yard on sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: JTLEITNER

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful replica but HUGE. Look at the dimensions and poundage before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: HUGE! It’s as long as my arm and as heavy as a party ham—3.3 pounds! The 7-year-old girl I intended it for may be turned off by it. But her 5-year-old brother will LOVE it. Have to make a decision. But it is an excellent reproduction.
customer_reviews.author: mhndrxl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality and detail. This Mosasaurus is huge! Well worth it! My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Valadez

customer_reviews.title: Great Huge Mosasaurus!  8 year old had lot of fun playing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson’s 8th birthday and it’s huge! He loved it. He right away wanted to take a bath with it and was in his own world. The only problem putting in water you have to squeeze and shake and let dry out for two days.
customer_reviews.author: ESGSF

customer_reviews.title: STRONG PLASTIC ODOR
customer_reviews.text: The toy itself is wonderful. However, when opening the package and taking the dino out, the strong smell of plastic was overwhelming. It has been 24 hours and the dinosaur still has a strong odor that radiates from the toy. I would send it back but my daughter loves it, so I will have to figure out how to get rid of the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Laura James

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and Huge
customer_reviews.text: This toy looks very realistic and kind of big for smaller kids. I ordered it for my nephew since he loves animals and stuff. He's been throwing it around ever since he got it. Try not to get hit with this toy because it will hurt. They could've made it a bit softer for kids. The packaging was slightly dented in during shipment so they could've packed it better.
customer_reviews.author: VL8288

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in the late summer trying to get ahead for Christmas shopping. Well Christmas day my little one was so excited to open it and when he did the front find we're missing from the box. Needless to say he was super disappointed. So I had to go to the local chain store and purchase a brand new one. Now mommy is super disappointed in spending extra money!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Exciting Fun Learning Toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is huge! My daughter loved how the dinosaurs in the Jurassic World Series resembled scale instead of being similar in size. No polyfil means easy draining so she can take “Mose” swimming!
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn

customer_reviews.title: A great toy for your dinosaur lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's birthday because she absolutely loves dinosaurs and she did not have anything like this one. I was very surprised at how big it was. She was so excited when she saw it her face lit up. It was worth a million bucks
customer_reviews.author: fiddlemama

customer_reviews.title: Here Come the Dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Mosasaurus to use as a display specimen at the conference about the history of my town since bones of one had been found in fossil beds and streams over the years. People were stunned to find that mosasaurs once roamed Monmouth County NJ.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Harold

customer_reviews.title: First one arrived damaged, second on has been great
customer_reviews.text: My son is a HUGE dino fan and loves this large toy. It's really held up to all of his rough play, so the first one must have been a flook. Surprisingly large sized, and nice soft rubber body.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not durable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson and he absolutely loved it! But after only 2 days, a fin was broken! He was so devastated that we bought him another(against my better judgement) because this was one of his birthday presents and we did not want him disappointed. We shopped early so "our window for returns" had run out. So, he loves the Dinoasaur but having to buy 2 just so he has 1 playable toy(WE HOPE) made it quite expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Paul J.

customer_reviews.title: Jurrasic World
customer_reviews.text: My son is a big fan of dinosaurs, anything Jurassic Park or Jurassic World. I ordered this a surprised him. He loved it! He couldn't believe how life like and how big it was.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. Much bigger than I expected so be warned. I got it as a Loch Ness Monster for my 7 year olds birthday party and it was a huge hit! The kids loved 'feeding' it fish. Lots of fun for any kid liking prehistoric creatures!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit worried that this was going to be a cheap knock off of the real thing selling for double price everywhere else. Turned out to be the same exact product just a cheaper price. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. Son loves it. He put it in the bath and to my relief it did not fill up with water. He was able to dry it off and keep playing unlike many toys that fill up and keep dripping.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mason

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: My son takes this everywhere we go and every kid wants to play with it. we have taken it to pools, it will float for a while before taking too much water. it's a fun bath toy, drains easy.. So worth the money. its taken beatings and is holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: AmericanHouseWife

customer_reviews.title: Real feel in my opinion is much like a heavy rubber latex material and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. My 8yo son is a huge Jurassic Park and World fan and has wanted this for a year. So when it came down in price I jumped on purchasing it for him for Christmas. He will be so excited. It says it's real feel but to me feels just like a thick rubber latex material. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for one of my grandsons for his birthday and he loved it. It is large, sturdy, and great fun. 5 months later and it still is intact and being played with. What more to expect from a toy for a rowdy 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars, but the tail is kind of awkward. It is fixed at a weird upward angle although my son doesn't notice it too much. He loves it, and it is huge...
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Baze

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: - Kid's favorite dinosaur from both Jurassic World films. - BIG toy - Great length - Jaw opens and closes. - Tail and fins are articulated. - Nice rubber "skin-like" feel / texture. - Definitely one of the cooler dinos in our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: HUGE and worth every penny! WOW! So impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the coolest JW toy we have bought! Searched for months for this item and for the price, be prepared to be shocked by the size! It’s HUGE! Cannot believe how affordable this big toy was! Amazon came through yet again!
customer_reviews.author: ajs

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: My 5 y.o. little nephew is a huge dinosaur nerd already. This thing was going to be his Santa Clause gift. I finally received it today, and let me say I'm very impreseed by it. Hope he like it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Vazgen Ghazaryan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy
customer_reviews.text: Take note of the dimensions...but apparently bigger is better when it comes to dinosaurs for little boys. Some assembly required..and yes it's long than box....Fanastic toy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rho

customer_reviews.title: Durable, large, moveable mosasaur
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves it! Good large size. A bit over 2 ft in length Moveable arms and mouth. Very sturdy toy, able to withstand rough play. Awesome for dinosaur lovers! Nice slate blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of four

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars but it was torn inside where one of the fins connected, making it difficult to assemble. Other than that it’s my sons favorite toy! He insists on taking it with him everywhere! It is a little large for him to carry, but that is what he loves about it!
customer_reviews.author: NDL

customer_reviews.title: Cool dino, kid loved it, but...
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this dinosaur but unfortunately Mattel included 2 sets of rear fins so I cannot attach the front ones. I guess I will have to contact Mattel and have them ship me replacement parts. They have always been good for customer service, just disappointed my son can't play with it til they can ship them.
customer_reviews.author: justin abell

customer_reviews.title: This brings out the big imaginations!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson and he loved it. Played with it the entire week while he was visiting and then took it home with him where he is still enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Breighner

customer_reviews.title: Rawrrr. (Buy this. Its awesome.)
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dino for any kid that likes them! My 3 year old absolutely loves it, he got it for christmas and its held up to toddler abuse for over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Jake, not from state farm.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my 8 year old nephew who is into Jurrasicwirld. He loved it-his favorite present. It a large toy and that made it even more exciting to him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! I've seen these for sale for up to as much as $150! My son has been wanting this and I'm so happy I was able to get it for such a good deal! It's also very large. My son will love this. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MountainMomma

customer_reviews.title: Defect in QC process
customer_reviews.text: Four different parts were supposed to come with but one of them was duplicate of the other so now mosasaurus missing one limb. Additionally this had to happen to us while we are stationed overseas due to military, which makes it hard to get hold of manufacture support. Since it is partially assembled this doesnt even fit into original packaging for return. Hope amazon was help as middle man but we will see how it plays out.
customer_reviews.author: Sae Jun Yang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy for the dinosaur enthusiast!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. The first one arrived her with 2 sets of back legs. That was disappointing, but we sent the first one back and the second one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Leosmom09

customer_reviews.title: Huge fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and build but the material smells horrible
customer_reviews.author: Dct

customer_reviews.title: This is a cool toy
customer_reviews.text: First of all- its huge. Second, any child who is obsessed with dinosaurs will love it. It is thick and quality and will hold up to rough play.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It’s big
customer_reviews.text: Like others have mentioned this is huge but your child will love it all the more. It’s sturdy yet soft enough for rough play without and injuries. Great value
customer_reviews.author: randy butternubs

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Really good but considering the size of the toy. Can fit the mini dinosaurs in his mouth for more pretend play. Would have been more awesome if it had a lever to open and close it’s mouth though. My son, a Jurassic World enthusiast, loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonseller

customer_reviews.title: WOW.  Really great value
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson's 10th birthday. When I got the package it was apart so it did not appear at huge as when it was all put together. My grandson just loved it and my son kept taking pics of it attacking the furniture. I was very pleased with the product and so was my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest looking and high quality toys I've gotten for my son. It reminds me of the high-quality durable toys that were around when I was a kid. The details for the mouth on this thing are great!
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with dinosaurs especially after watching jurassic park he loved the mosasourus! He is huge he loves it so much
customer_reviews.author: Sarah f

customer_reviews.title: Great mosasaur
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my Jurrasic World fan. He was thrilled to add this prehistoric marine reptile to his collection and play with it in the bath. It looks and feels great
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Giant Mososaurus- What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this toy and it is quite durable. Very large as I’m sure many are saying, but that just makes it more fun. It also floats!
customer_reviews.author: KP27

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for Dinosaur fans
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a gift for my sons 4th birthday ...Which actually isnt until May - so He has not been given this gift yet. But a friend of his has the exact same thing and it is the only toy he ever asks to play with when he visits. The "real feel" texture is a nice soft rubber and one of the best purchases ive made this year.
customer_reviews.author: Karley Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Huge Fish
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old grandson plays with this Mosasaurus but it looks like a big fish to me. It's huge and he has a lot fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Big nice toy
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son loves this toy and yes it is that big! Big nice sized hard toy. I recommend it for the kiddos 5 and up that loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Micah Pleasant

customer_reviews.title: Kids love
customer_reviews.text: My Dino loving kids love this! Is expensive bit defiantly ended up being worth the price with the feel and look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rice

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday gift ever!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s huge!! My 6 year old loves that he can fit all the other dinosaurs in its mouth. Very well made and lots of fun for a dinosaur loving kid!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E

customer_reviews.title: Kids love playing with their mosasaurus
customer_reviews.text: My kids are going through the dinosaur phase right now and mosasaurus is a big hit. It's bigger than our 3 year old and that doesn't stop him from dragging it around the house
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian0816

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this! He is a huge dinosaur fan and this thing was pretty cool and really big! Happy kid and happy mom.
customer_reviews.author: dara maughan

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to one of my grandsons. It was his favorite gift from Christmas. He takes it everywhere which isn't easy because it is a good size dinosaur. Excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: JulieBob

customer_reviews.title: Dysfunctional, tall wont connect and find pop off
customer_reviews.text: Sending this thing back because the fins keep popping off and the tail part where it is supposed to connect is made backwards therefore it won't snap or click together......very disappointed because my grandson was super excited about getting it. I would have given it a 0 rating if it would have allowed me to do so
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Got for my grandson for Christmas!!! The mouth opens. He is 3 and is very hard on it. Well made. Pretty tough
customer_reviews.author: Kim Suchy

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the kids they love how huge it is
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge and awesome. Kids love it because its a mosa I would buy it again but it feels like it will last forever
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he is extremely happy with it. Very good size and seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hiller

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! The skin has a fun texture! The giant mouth opens widely! The fins move, too. It's a giant toy!
customer_reviews.author: Sir Kristoffer, Baron of Brown County

customer_reviews.title: Large!
customer_reviews.text: It’s BIG!! Bigger than expected. I normally review dimensions prior to purchase, but in this case I didn’t care....was for a kid who loves Dinos.
customer_reviews.author: T Adams

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool toy for any kid who loves dinosaurs or Jurassic World! My 5 year old twins love this Mosasaurus.
customer_reviews.author: LJS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our dino lover
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son's birthday - he's been begging for it forever. He's seen it at every store and this is the exact same one.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K.

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and fun
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, my daughter is obsessed with dinosaurs and anything associated with them. So this was a perfect addition. Its huge! Very realistic. It does have a pretty bad odor, hoping it wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby G

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old was ecstatic when he opened this gift this year. It was tough to out together but it makes it tough for a 7 year old to tear apart. Well made and great addition to our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Tech & Kids

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: Best dino ever. My son drags it everywhere! Even sleeps with it. It's massive. Holds up to a 6yr old boy!
customer_reviews.author: AMarshall

product_meta.title: Jurassic World Real Feel Mosasaurus
feature_bullets: ​Get ready for thrilling action and adventure with Jurassic World! ​
​Making a bigger splash than ever, Mosasaurus, the colossal swimming creature, is back again! ​
​Mosasaurus will thrill fans with its massive size and movie-inspired design!​
​Authentic textured skin, realistic sculpting and articulation make colossal creature come to life. ​
